mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) Cnt FROM ORDERMAIN WHERE OM_NUM = #{orderNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERMAIN ( OM_SEQ, OM_NUM, OM_PGTID, OM_OWNERID, OM_OWNERNAME, OM_ACCOUNTMONEY, OM_SAVEMONEY, OM_POINTMONEY, OM_COUPONMONEY, OM_CARDMONEY, OM_KAKAOMONEY, OM_PHONEMONEY, OM_ETC2, OM_ETC3, OM_ETC4, OM_ETC5, OM_ETC6, OM_LEVEL, OM_TYPE, OM_USE, OM_CPPAYTYPE, OM_ESCROWUSE, OM_ESCROWSTATUS, OM_DEPOSITACCOUNT, OM_DEPOSITACCOUNTBANK, OM_DEPOSITACCOUNTNAME, OM_MOID, OM_INID, OM_MODATE, OM_INDATE, OM_PAYPALMONEY, OM_PAYPALSALEID, OM_EXCHANGERATE, OM_LANGUAGE, OM_REFERER ) VALUES ( ordermainseq.nextval, #{omNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omPgtId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omOwnerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIM(#{omOwnerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR }), #{omAccountMoney, jdbcType=NUMERIC }, #{omSaveMoney, jdbcType=NUMERIC }, #{omPointMoney, jdbcType=NUMERIC }, #{omStatus, jdbcType=NUMERIC }, #{omActiveStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, RPAD( #{omCreditCardNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 16, '*' ), #{omCreditCardNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omCreditCardCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omAccountBankCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omEtc1, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omEtc2, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omEtc3, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omEtc4, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omEtc5, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omEscrowStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDepositAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDepositAccountBank, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDepositAccountName, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDepositAccountInName, #{omRefundAccountName, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDeliType, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDeliPayType, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDeliMoenyUse, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDeliMemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDeliNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDeliBoxEa, jdbcType=NUMERIC }, #{omPccSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC }, #{omAccessType, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omDeliInOutType, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{omPayType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omCardType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omActAdminId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omGiftPrCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omGiftPrName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omGiftPrName1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omGiftPrName2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omPhoneNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omCoupon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omMoId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omInId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omInDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{omMoDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{omPaypalMoney, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{omPaypalSaleId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omExchangeRate, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{language, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO ORDERADDRESS ( OA_SEQ, OA_OMNUM, OA_OSSERIAL, OA_NAME, OA_ADDR1, OA_ADDR2, OA_ADDR3, OA_ZIPCODE, OA_TEL, OA_FAX, OA_PHONE, OA_EMAIL, OA_LEVEL, OA_TYPE, OA_USE, OA_DELINAME, OA_DELIMEMO, OA_ORDERERTEL, OA_ORDEREREMAIL, OA_MOID, OA_INID, OA_MODATE, OA_INDATE, OA_ZONECODE, OA_COUNTRYCODE, OA_COUNTRYNAME, OA_BUYERNAME, OA_BUYERPHONE, OA_BUYEREMAIL, OA_BUYERCOUNTRYCODE, OA_BUYERCOUNTRYNAME, OA_ADDRESSTYPE ) VALUES ( orderaddress_seq.nextval, #{oaOmNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaOsSerial, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TRIM(#{oaName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{oaAddr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaAddr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaAddr3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaZipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIM(#{oaPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), TRIM(#{oaEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{oaLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaUse, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaDeliName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaDeliMemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIM(#{oaOrderErTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), TRIM(#{oaOrderErEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{oaMoId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaInId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaInDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{oaMoDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{oaZoneCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaCountryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaCountryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIM(#{oaBuyerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), TRIM(#{oaBuyerPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), TRIM(#{oaBuyerEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{oaBuyerCountryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaBuyerCountryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaAddressType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO ORDERSUBHISTORY ( OSH_SEQ, OSH_OMNUM, OSH_OSSERIAL, OSH_MEMO, OSH_OSSTATUS, OSH_LEVEL, OSH_TYPE, OSH_USE, OSH_MOID, OSH_INID, OSH_MODATE, OSH_INDATE ) VALUES ( ORDERSUB_HISTORY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{oshOmNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oshOsSerial, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{oshMemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oshOsStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oshLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oshType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oshUse, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oshMoId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oshInId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oshMoDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{oshInDate, jdbcType=DATE} )
